phrases.phrase: Notifications are sent upon a specific event on your account such as a logon using an unrecognized IP address. If your account is ever compromised using an unrecognized IP address, you will receive a notification notifying you of the login.

{username},

We noticed a login to your account on {board} from a new IP address. If this was not you, we recommend that you change your password immediately.

Details:

  • IP Address: {ip}
  • User Agent: {agent}
To change your password or update security notification settings, please visit our {security} page.
Receive a notification each time your account is accessed by a new IP address.
